name: HTML and CSS are your new friends
description: Congratulations! if you are reading this, means you are one step closer to become a techman, this is how I call myself too(no I am not lol)

name: What are the CRUD operations
description: Well done techman! I didn't expect to see you that far! In computer programming, create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) are the four basic functions of persistent storage.

name: Take a break from coding
description: If you can't debug your code, get a coffee, come back to it, and yes! you fixed it!
